meanings.definition: A type of vocal range in singing.
meanings.sent1: Her spintos was impressive during the choir performance.
meanings.sent2: The singer showcased her spintos beautifully in the opera.
meanings.sent3: The spintos of the songbird made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His spintos soared above the melody like a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The spintos echoed through the concert hall, leaving a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The act of spinning or rotating quickly.
meanings.sent1: The sudden spintos of the dancer amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The spintos of the spinning top fascinated the children.
meanings.sent3: The spintos of the tornado were both scary and mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: The spintos of the carousel created a blur of colors and lights.
meanings.sent5: The spintos of the wheel spun faster and faster, creating a whirlwind of motion.
